CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(EmployeesRange__c,""),0,1) + IF(LEN(EmailDomain__c)=0,0,1) + IF(LEN(Website)=0,0,1) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Industry,""),0,1) + IF(ISPICKVAL(SalesTeam__c,""),0,1) + IF(ISPICKVAL(SalesTerritoryAE__c,""),0,1) + IF(LEN(BillingStreet)=0||LEN(BillingCity)=0||LEN(BillingPostalCode)=0||LEN(BillingCountry)=0,0,1)
CustomField.label: Data Quality Score
